<table id="sessions-table" class="table table-responsive-lg table-striped table-bordered margin-bottom-0">
Response Rate
<tr *ngFor="let sessionsTableRowModel of sessionsTableRowModels; let idx = index">

<a *ngIf="sessionsTableRowModel.instructorPrivilege.canModifySession; else editSessionBtn" tmRouterLink="/web/instructor/sessions/edit" [queryParams]="{ courseid: sessionsTableRowModel.feedbackSession.courseId, fsname: sessionsTableRowModel.feedbackSession.feedbackSessionName, editingMode: true }">
<button id="btn-soft-delete-{{ idx }}" type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-sm" (click)="moveSessionToRecycleBin(idx)"
<button id="btn-copy-{{ idx }}" type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-sm" ngbTooltip="Copy feedback session details" (click)="copySession(idx)">Copy</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-sm" ngbTooltip="Start submitting feedback"
<button id="btn-results-{{ idx }}" class="btn btn-light btn-sm" ngbDropdownToggle>Results</button>
<button id="btn-unpublish-{{ idx }}" class="btn dropdown-item clickable" ngbTooltip="Make responses no longer visible" placement="left" container="body"
ngbTooltip="Make session responses available for viewing" placement="left" container="body" (click)="publishSession(idx)">Publish Results</button>

<button id="btn-resend-{{ idx }}" class="btn dropdown-item clickable" *ngIf="sessionsTableRowModel.feedbackSession.publishStatus === FeedbackSessionPublishStatus.PUBLISHED" (click)="remindResultsLinkToStudent(idx)">Resend link to view results</button>
<div ngbDropdown class="d-inline-block" ngbTooltip="Send e-mails to remind students and instructors who have not submitted their feedbacks to do so">
<button ngbDropdownToggle id="btn-remind-{{ idx }}" class="btn btn-light btn-sm"
<button id="btn-remind-all-{{ idx }}" class="btn dropdown-item clickable" (click)="sendRemindersToAllNonSubmitters(idx); setRowClicked(idx)">Remind all non-submitters</button>
<button id="btn-remind-selected-{{ idx }}" class="btn dropdown-item clickable" (click)="sendRemindersToSelectedNonSubmitters(idx); setRowClicked(idx)" >Select non-submitters to remind</button>

Ooops! Your Google account {{user}} is not known to TEAMMATES
To access a course on TEAMMATES, you need to wait until an instructor adds you to that course. As a confirmation, TEAMMATES will send you instructions on how to access that particular course.
If you 'joined' the course in TEAMMATES using a Google account before, but cannot log in anymore, these are the possible reasons:

You used a different Google account to access TEAMMATES in the past. In that case, you need to use the same Google account to access TEAMMATES again. Log out and re-log in using the other Google account. If you don't remember which Google account you used previously, email us from the same email account to which you receive TEAMMATES emails.
You changed the primary email from a non-Gmail address to a Gmail address recently. In that case,
so that we can reconfigure your account to use the new Gmail address.
You joined this course just a few seconds ago and your data may be still in the process of propagating through our servers. In that case, please try this same page in a few minutes.

The page below resembles the submission page as seen by the respondent {{ personName }} ({{ moderatedPerson }}).
You can use it to moderate responses submitted by the respondent or submit responses on behalf of the respondent.
Note that due to visibility settings, questions that are not supposed to show responses to instructors (i.e you) are not shown in the page below.

To access other features you need to log in using a Google account (optional).
You can use the Submit Response for Question _ buttons to submit one-response-at-a-time.
Alternatively, you can submit all responses in one go using the Submit Responses for All Questions button at the bottom of this page.
• You may edit your submission any number of times before the closing time of this session.
